title: Additional Lanterns
description: Additional Lanterns adds many new lanterns with different colors and materials! Lanterns can be turned on and off using an empty hand or with redstone.

title: Alex's Mobs
description: Alex's Mobs is a Forge mod that adds 89 new mobs to Minecraft.

title: Applied Energistics 2
description: Applied Energistics 2 (AE2) is a comprehensive mod for Minecraft that introduces a unique approach to in-game inventory management.

title: Aquaculture 2
description: Aquaculture 2 expands the fishing system in Minecraft with over 30 new fish to catch either with a rod (any modded or vanilla rod will work!) or found swimming in the wild.

title: Biomes O' Plenty
description: Biomes O' Plenty is an expansive biome mod for Minecraft that adds a slew of new, unique biomes to the Overworld, Nether, and End!

title: Canary
description: Canary is a general performance optimization mod and unofficial fork of Lithium mod for Minecraft Forge.

title: Create
description: Welcome to Create, a mod offering a variety of tools and blocks for Building, Decoration and Aesthetic Automation.

title: Customizable Elytra
description: Allows Elytra to be dyed and have banners placed onto them, in the same way as leather armor and shields.

title: Entity Culling Fabric/Forge
description: Minecraft skips rendering things that are behind you, so why is it rendering everything that you still can't see because of a wall in the way?

title: GraveStone Mod
description: Every time you die, a grave is placed at your position. To retrieve your items just break the grave.

title: Iron Furnaces
description: Maximize smelting efficiency with unparalleled speed, reconfigurable sides, augments for smoking and blasting, and much more.

title: Just Enough Items
description: JEI is an item and recipe viewing mod for Minecraft, built from the ground up for stability and performance.

title: Macaw's Bridges
description: This simple mod adds a variety of bridges.

title: Macaw's Bridges - Biomes O' Plenty
description: This mod adds compatibility between Macaw's Bridges and Biome O' Plenty

title: Macaw's Doors
description: This mod gives you the opportunity to make vanila doors with every wood color.

title: Macaw's Fences - Biomes O' Plenty
description: This mod adds compatibility between Macaw's Fences and Biome O' Plenty

title: Macaw's Fences and Walls
description: This mod adds new Wooden fences, gates, Stone walls, stone gates, special wired fences which do damage.

title: Macaw's Furniture
description: Macaw's Furniture focuses on different styles of furniture and customization.

title: Macaw's Furniture - Biomes O' Plenty
description: This mod adds compatibility between Macaw's Furnitures and Biome O' Plenty

title: Macaw's Lights and Lamps
description: This very simple mod adds new light sources like: Tiki Torches, Street Lamp Posts, and Ceiling Lights

title: Macaw's Paintings
description: This mod adds 46 paintings, with a vanila fitting style.

title: Macaw's Paths and Pavings
description: This Macaw's mod is another addition to the Macaw's Mod series, the first version adds wooden paths and 6 pavings.

title: Macaw's Roofs
description: Macaw's Roofs mod includes many types of new stuff : Roofs, Steep Roofs, Lower Roofs, Awnings, Top Roofs, Rain Gutters and a lot more!

title: Macaw's Roofs - Biomes O' Plenty
description: This mod adds compatibility between Macaw's Roofs and Biome O' Plenty

title: Macaw's Trapdoors
description: Macaw's Trapdoor adds vanila trapdoors in every plank variation and it adds new trapdoors too.

title: Macaw's Windows
description: This Minecraft Window mod is all about windows, it adds lots of windows

title: Rubidium
description: Rubidium is an Unofficial Fork of CaffeineMC's Sodium, made to work with Forge Mod Loader.

title: Saturn
description: Saturn aims on optimizing memory usage in a lot of ways, such as fixing in-game memory leaks, reducing GC heap and more

title: Simply Light
description: Simply Light is a Lighting mod with a simplistic design. Modern look and feel with an architecture view in mind.

title: Traveler's Backpack
description: Traveler's Backpack is a Minecraft mod, which adds backpacks

title: WTHIT
description: WTHIT is a mod that adds an ingame tooltip with information about what block (or fluid) the player is looking at.

title: Beautify!
description: Beautify is a client and serverside deco-mod that adds lots of vanilla-styled ways to spice up your builds with custom models.

title: Farmer's Delight
description: Farmer's Delight is a mod that gently expands upon farming and cooking in Minecraft.

title: Immersive Engineering
description: Immersive Engineering is a tech mod with a certain charm, based on the ideas and concepts, and with most assets created by Damien Hazard.

title: Ok Zoomer
description: Ok Zoomer is a mod that adds a configurable feature-packed zoom key, which allows for zooming. By default, the zoom key is bound to C

title: Yung's Better Desert Temples
description: The ultimate upgrade to Minecraft's desert temples! YUNG's Better Desert Temples redesigns vanilla desert temples to be way more exciting, adding a variety of new puzzles, traps, & parkour challenges.

title: Yung's Better Dungeons
description: A complete redesign of Minecraft's dungeons like never before. YUNG's Better Dungeons redesigns vanilla dungeons while also adding new dungeons

title: Yung's Better End Island
description: An overhaul of the main End Island where the dragon fight takes place!

title: Yung's Better Jungle Temples
description: A complete overhaul of Minecraft's Jungle Temples!

title: Yung's Better Mineshafts
description: This mod completely revamps vanilla abandoned mineshafts, changing them from boring straight lines into dynamic, varied webs of tunnels.

title: Yung's Better Nether Fortresses
description: A complete overhaul of Minecraft's Nether fortresses!

title: Yung's Better Ocean Monuments
description: A complete overhaul of Minecraft's ocean monuments!

title: Yung's Better Strongholds
description: A complete redesign of Minecraft strongholds like never before, making them much more complex and exciting while still staying true to vanilla themes.

title: Yung's Better Witch Huts
description: An upgrade to witch huts! This mod adds multiple new hut variants that can spawn as well as a witch's circle.

title: Yung's Bridges
description: YUNG's Bridges is the first Minecraft mod to ever add naturally generated bridges to the game.

title: Yung's Extras
description: A myriad of structures, features, and vanilla+ content.
